title: Swiggy | SDE 1 - Backend Engineer | Remote
content:
Education: B.Tech from NIT
Years of Experience: 1.3+ years
Title/Level: SWE-1
Current Company: Big MNC
Current Comp : 14(base) + 5(stocks) annually


Company: Swiggy
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Backend Engineer


Compensation:
Base Pay: INR 20,00,000
Stocks: INR 10,00,000(vested over 4 years)
Total Compensation: 22.5LPA
Remote (need to visit bangalore office for 1 week in 3 months).

I will be promoted to SDE-II in my current org in next 6 months. Considering this after 6 months I'll be eligible for SDE-II role. My preparation is quite good as of now. Only need to brush up some system design concepts. 
I have GS and Google interview lined up too for SDE-1 Position.
Recruiter is not up for negotiation maybe because I don't have any competing offers as of now.

Please let me know are they low balling me ? Should I consider joining them.

PS : Will update the interview experience soon.
